summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Rakesh School Attendance Management System with Google OAuth integration. Backend API testing achieved 84.6% success rate with minor security issues identified. Frontend testing showed excellent results with beautiful responsive design and proper OAuth integration.

security_bugs.issue: Allows unauthorized access - returns 200 with empty array instead of 401

configuration_issues.issue: OPTIONS requests don't return proper CORS headers
configuration_issues.impact: May affect frontend-backend communication in some browsers

action_item_for_E1: Fix the security issue in /api/classes endpoint to require authentication (should return 401 for unauthorized access instead of 200 with empty array). Optionally add proper CORS headers for OPTIONS requests.

detailed_findings.authentication_flow: Google OAuth integration working correctly - redirects to auth.emergentagent.com
detailed_findings.ui_quality: Excellent responsive design with professional styling, gradient background, and clean card layout
detailed_findings.error_handling: App gracefully handles API failures and network errors
detailed_findings.accessibility: Good accessibility features including lang attribute and proper text content
detailed_findings.security: Most endpoints properly secured except /api/classes which has unauthorized access issue
